import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faWind } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faMoon } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faSun } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faWater } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faEye } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function Highlights({deg, speed, gust, sunset, sunrise, humidity, pressure, visibility, feelsLike}) { return (

Todays Highlights

Air Quality Index

DEG

{deg}

SPEED

{speed}

GUST

{gust}

Humidity

{humidity}%

Pressure

{pressure}

Sunrise & Sunset

SUNRISE

{sunrise}

SUNSET

{sunset}
) }
